title: Functional Specification
synopsis: A functional specification describes how a product will work entirely from the user's perspective. It doesn't care how the thing is implemented. It talks about features. It specifies screens, menus, dialogs, and so on - [http://www.joelonsoftware.com/articles/fog0000000035.html joelonsoftware.com]

title: Platform Earth Activity
synopsis: View all activity from [[Platform Earth Sites]] listed in the roster below:

title: Scenarios
synopsis: When you're designing a product, you need to have some real live scenarios in mind for how people are going to use it. Otherwise you end up designing a product that doesn't correspond to any real-world usage (like the Cue?Cat).

title: Welcome Visitors
